data.title: Standard B Site Dog Exec
data.description: Use Trailblazer to clear B Site for a quick push.

data.title: Standard A Dog + Flash Exec
data.description: Use Trailblazer to clear A Site for your team, before flashing to cover their approach.

data.title: Mid Wood Doors Anti-Wallbang Trailblazer
data.description: If you tuck yourself into the corner to the left of the Mid Wood Doors in Mid when you go to send a Trailblazer into A Site / Mid Wood Doors, players would have to stand very close to the Mid Wood Doors at an awkward angle to wallbang you through the Doors.

data.title: B Main To Back B Site Trailblazer
data.description: This is useful for checking for players on the close left side of Back B Site, ideally when B Main is smoked off.
